resource.chars:
the two unguarded Barometers 
stood lowest in the scale 
and that which had been 
longest made was most 
depressed: while the guarded 
Barometer agreed with both 
the fresh-boiled Barometer 
in standing higher than 
the other two. It is true 
that the difference of .006 In
is but small: but the 
depression is as much as 
could have been expected 
in the time and the fine 
observations being consistent 
together will be allowed,
I imagine to give great 
weight to the conclusion
